channel.title: Need help MYsql
channel.description: everytime i try to run the server it says failed to connect with mysql can someone help me reslove the problem team speak id-619 269 367 pass-8177 the problem is the when i press "runserver" it says this "failed to connect with mysql".

item.title: Need help MYsql
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

it’s because you need to make a MySQL database and account, then edit MySQL.java with your info.
